main event: A UFO was observed in the vicinity of the Henry Barracks in San Juan, Puerto Rico on 6th November 1954. The object was described as metallic, oscillating back and forth across a searchlight beam, exhibiting no tail or appendages, and was estimated to be about 6 feet in diameter.
interesting points: The UFO was observed by 3 civilians and 1 military personnel, making the witnesses credible.
The object was initially seen at an altitude of approximately 200 feet and then descended to around 150 feet.
It was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 2 to 3 miles per hour and appeared very bright upon emergence from a small cloud.
The UFO reportedly tried to disappear slowly with less brightness, and no noise or sound was heard.
The case prompted a response from the Ramey Air Force Base and led to the Air Force taking over the final investigation and report.
